content.description: This is the direct line climbing out from the from the cave. Start with your left hand in the hueco pocket and your right on the crimp. Climb out using the pockets and underclings until you can pull the roof.  It's currently an open project so make sure to let me know if you get it.
Variation of Canary couple more moves bigger holds same epic finish.
content.location: Start on low rail hold move up and right follow big holds to the same finish as Canary

content.description: Variation of Song Bird. Sit start to the right of Song Bird about 5 feet. Starts with left hand in sharp 3 finger pocket, right hand pinch the small arete, and right leg knee-skums around the corner. Avoid using the shelves underneath for your left foot (sort of an eliminate). A hard opening sequence links you into the second half of Song Bird.
Sit start with your hands under the cows head feature.  Then pull hard and throw for the top.
content.location: Right of the Song Bird Roof about 30'.

content.description: Start on the ledge on the far right side of the boulder below the roof with a right heel hook and hands matched in the slot. Traverse out right on slopers and crimps with tension. After gaining the big triangular pinch, complete some interesting beta possibly involving a Bathang to reach the finish hold on the left end of the boulder. Note that this is a contrived eliminate - the top out jugs on the top of the boulder are off.
content.location: Start on the ledge on the far right side of the boulder below the roof with a right heel hook and hands matched in the slot.

content.description: A nice problem with great movement.  Sit start with your right hand hueco pocket and your left on the thin hold in the corner. The move up to the good holds on the outside of the roof.  Hey high feet and go for three spicy top-out.
content.protection: Crash pad.  If you don't have a spotter bring at least two.
content.location: Start is just left of Song Bird.

content.description: The song bird roof is a hidden gem with several problems under the roof and a few to the right.  Keep a look out because urs easy to miss.
